Nightshift retracts his paw from the door.

" Good point, not gonna go that=
 way.  And I would keep this as quiet as possible.  Sorry, no big guns chie=
f, that's gonna make things messy.  There's gotta be a kill switch somewher=
e.  I bet if we find that, turn the power grid off, and then move in, that'=
ll buy us some time.  Question is where the slag is the main switch board?"=


Don't be envious of what you don't have, be grateful for things you alrea=
dy posses.  Nothing is worth more than family and friends.

On Nov 18, 2011=
, at 5:40 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> =
>
> > Nightshift extends a claw and looks to Batscout with a raised brow.
>=
 >
> > " Well, first time for everything. I know how but I never used one o=
f
> > these. Let's see how this works. Hopefully there's noth'n on the door=

> > that's gonna shock the scrap outa me . Wish me luck."
> >
> > Slowly h=
e edges his claw to the lock.
> 
> <NEW>
> 
> "Hey Kid!" Came a commanding =
voice, POLAR CLAW's, it was being
> transmitted by BATSCOUT, obviously he h=
ad been getting updates from
> the drone. "You told me to give you a back d=
oor and you can get in,
> not get yourself fried."
> 
> "Do you have the sk=
ills to get past the doors?" POLARCLAW asked, "Or
> we can send WOLFGANG to=
 blow the door."
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> - Preston
> 

--Apple-Mail-B41AA5E3-BEBF-4F19-994A-9B671DEB4279

<html><head></head><body bgcolor=3D"#FFFFFF"><div>Nightshift retracts his p=
aw from the door.</div><div><br></div><div>" Good point, not gonna go that =
way.  And I would keep this as quiet as possible.  Sorry, no big =
guns chief, that's gonna make things messy.  There's gotta be a kill s=
witch somewhere.  I bet if we find that, turn the power grid off, and =
then move in, that'll buy us some time.  Question is where the slag is=
 the main switch board?"<br><br>Don't be envious of what you don't have, be=
 grateful for things you already posses.  Nothing is worth more than f=
amily and friends.</div><div><br>On Nov 18, 2011, at 5:40 PM, Super Cyclonu=

      <p>> <OLD><br>
><br>
> Nightshift =
extends a claw and looks to Batscout with a raised brow.<br>
><br>
> =
" Well, first time for everything.  I know how but I never used one of<br>
=
> these.  Let's see how this works.  Hopefully there's noth'n on the doo=
r<br>
> that's gonna shock the scrap outa me .  Wish me luck."<br>
><=
br>
> Slowly he edges his claw to the lock.<br>
<br>
<NEW><br>
<br=
>
"Hey Kid!" Came a commanding voice, POLAR CLAW's, it was being<br>
transm=
itted by BATSCOUT, obviously he had been getting updates from<br>
the drone=
. "You told me to give you a back door and you can get in,<br>
not get your=
self fried."<br>
<br>
"Do you have the skills to get past the doors?" POLAR=
CLAW asked, "Or<br>
we can send WOLFGANG to blow the door."<br>
